TopicTitle: Kerbal Adventures! Ep1 - Foundations - Satellites and Geostationary Orbits

Articles.Content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b6fRbcLEbAk



Welcome to the first episode of my very first series ever!!

In this series you will join me as we explore the solar system for the good of Kerbal kind everywhere.

Today we're going to play with satellites as we set up our geostationary relay network.
I'm going to be focusing on a couple of mods in this series, mainly Kethane and Remotetech but I'm sure to make additions in the future.

As it's my first series I'm still working out how to best produce this and I would very much appreciate ANY comments or criticism. Thanks and I hope you enjoy!
